text: On October 4, 1963, the President of Brazil, Jo√£o Goulart sent to the National Congress a request for a state of exception. Goulart requested that the state of exception would be for 30 days. He claimed that it would be necessary because the economy in Brazil was in a crisis. The request was rejected by the right and the left of National Congress. The President removed the request on October 7. ==References== ===Sources=== Books * Articles and papers * * * * Documents * Category:Politics of Brazil
